name: Shortest Path
description: Calculates the shortest path in a network of curves

inputs.name: Curves
inputs.description: The group of curves that form the network to traverse

inputs.name: Starts
inputs.description: The point or points that form the starting point of the path

inputs.name: Ends
inputs.description: The point or points that form the end point of the path

inputs.name: Lengths
inputs.description: A manually-specified length for each curve; useful if you want to artificially

outputs.name: Shortest Path
outputs.description: The curve showing the shortest connection

outputs.name: Succession
outputs.description: The indices of the curves that form the shortest path

outputs.name: Direction
outputs.description: True if the curve in succession is walked from start to end, false otherwise

outputs.name: Length
outputs.description: The total length, as an aggregation of the input lengths measured along the path
